keyword: calories in in n out cheeseburger
title: Calories in In-N-Out Cheeseburger
meta_description: Discover calories in In-N-Out cheeseburger, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out cheeseburger with toasted bun, beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and Thousand Island-style spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out cheeseburger has 480 kcal, 22 g protein, and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, pickles, grilled onions)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out cheeseburger has 480 calories.

faqs.q: What is the protein in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 22 g of protein per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
Are there trans fats in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1 g of trans fat from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Removing the bun saves ~240 kcal; adding cheese or extras increases it by 50â€“100 kcal.
